alert.note: Alert for South Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 20 at 2:37PM MST until February 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 7 PM MST TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For the second Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, southwest winds 40 to 55 mph with gusts up to 85 mph possible. * WHERE...South Central Mountains. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the second Wind Advisory, from 8 AM to 7 PM MST Tuesday. For the High Wind Watch, from late Tuesday night through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy areas of blowing dust will be possible. This may locally reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.
